101301.desc:
A status earned by using Skill 1: Fury of Asura, Skill 2: Imprisoned, or Skill 3: Earth Shatter.
Increases Fire DMG while in effect.

101501.desc: Status points earned by spending Divine Grace for an extra attack in Skill 3: Tear & Devour.

101502.desc:
A team buff obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Effect: Physical DMG +

101601.desc: A mark obtained by spending Divine Grace in Skill 1: Assault Tactic, Skill 2: Elimination Tactic, or Skill 3: Siege Tactic.

101602.desc:
Buff stack obtained by spending Pressure Tanks in Spinning Slash.
Increases DMG and can be stacked.

101603.desc: A status obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

101701.desc: A status entered using the final strike of a normal attack or Skill 3: Bastet's Caprice.

101702.desc:
A state inflicted on enemies by Aether Code: Sekhmet's Doppelganger - Execution.
DMG is increased against enemies in this state.

101703.desc:
A status entered by using Skill 3: Bastet's Caprice.
Increases Movement SPD while active, and Non-DoT Independent DMG for 1 attack only.

101901.desc: An additional attack summoned by Skill 1: Winged Lance or Aether Code: Skycleave Wings - Last Traces.

102001.desc: A state granted by using an Ultimate Skill while in the Age of Destruction form.

102002.desc: A state granted by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain while in the Age of Creation form.

102003.desc: Status points gained from normal attacks, Skill 2: Mahākāla, or Dodge effects.

102004.desc:
A state granted by using Aether Code: Creator - Lotus Blossom.
Grants invincibility when attacked.

102101.desc: Status points granted by using Skill 2: Dawn Finale or Skill 3: Sunrise Rhapsody to clear the Harmonizing Chord state from the enemy.

102102.desc: A status granted by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

102103.desc: A state inflicted on enemies by using Skill 1: Daybreak Quartet.

102104.desc: A state granted by using Aether Code: Lighthouse Harmony - Player.

102201.desc: A state granted by using Skill 3: Lunar Cycle when Moonphase is empty.

102202.desc: A state granted by using Skill 3: Lunar Cycle when Moonphase is full.

102203.desc: Status points gained by using a normal attack or skill.

102204.desc: The basic form of the skill, which will be replaced when switching forms.

102205.desc: Replaced skill triggered after a specific number of normal attack strikes.

102206.desc: Skill swapped to after using the corresponding skill's Sonata.

102207.desc: A state granted after switching to the Full Moon form.

102208.desc:
A pillar of light placed on the battlefield by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain while in the New Moon form.
Will continue to taunt normal and elite enemies.

102209.desc:
A pillar of light placed on the battlefield by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain while in the Full Moon form.
Will inflict Lunar Eclipse on enemies.

102210.desc: A state inflicted on enemies by using Full Moon Brilliant.

102402.desc: A status inflicted on enemies by Aether Code: Weigher of Hearts - Judgment that deals damage at regular intervals.

102601.desc:
A team buff obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Effect: Gains the Unyielding buff, which deals damage to the enemy when attacked.

102602.desc:
A status inflicted on enemies when Skill 1: Bullet Hail or Skill 2: Ground Blast are fully charged.
While in effect, increases DMG against enemies with this status and triggers AoE DMG when a fully charged skill hits an enemy with this status.

102801.desc:
Status points earned when normal attacks or skills hit, or by an Extremity Dodge.
Depletes points automatically over time, and increases Independent DMG depending on the number of points earned.

102802.desc:
A status triggered by derivative skills.
Temporarily grants Invincibility. Won't deplete Thundercloud while in effect and increases Thunder DMG.

102803.desc:
A status obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Grants immunity to all control and DMG. Prevents the use of movement, skills, and dodging. Clears all Thundercloud and is not automatically depleted.

103201.desc: A chess piece placed by the first strike of Skill 2: Gambit.

103202.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 2: Gambit.

103301.desc: An area generated by using Skill 3: Lightrealm Ultimate/Gensrealm Ultimate.

103701.desc:
A status inflicted on enemies by Aether Code: Thorns of Darkness - Chaotic Soul.
Increases the DMG taken.

104101.desc:
A status obtained by using Skill 3: Concerto Chordblade, an Ultimate Skill, or Ultimate Skillchain.
While in effect, automatically depletes Divine Grace, and each attack judged Harmonious grants a stack of Harmony.

104102.desc: Normal attacks and skills will be judged halfway through when in the Hummingblade state, and will be deemed Harmonious if they hit within the desired range.

104103.desc: Buff stacks gained when Harmony Judgement is successful in the Hummingblade state.

104104.desc:
A status earned after a certain number of normal attacks are judged as Harmonious and hit while in the Hummingblade state.
Grants Unyielding while in effect, all normal attacks and skills are deemed Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, and all Harmony stacks are considered as multiples.

104201.desc: A mark gained at regular intervals while Divine Grace is within a certain range. Increases Crit Rate and Crit DMG depending on the number of marks.

104202.desc:
A status gained by using Skill 1: Shadow Dance Twirl.
The next instance of Skill 2: Puppet Show: Prelude or Skill 3: Puppet Show: March will be substituted for Puppet Show: Waltz or Puppet Show: Rondo.

104203.desc:
A status gained by holding down normal attack when Chthonic Marks are full.
Increases Crit Rate, Crit DMG, and Fixed DMG while in effect. Prevents the use of skills, gaining marks, and spending/gaining Divine Grace through Leuce or Mintha.

104204.desc: A status that inflicts continuous DMG to the enemy for as long as Mintha sustains her Skill 2: Puppet Show: Prelude attack.

104205.desc: A status that inflicts continuous DMG to the enemy for as long as Leuce sustains her Skill 2: Puppet Show: Prelude attack.

104901.desc: An ice mirror created by the third strike of a normal attack, Skill 1: Higan: Frostdance, or Skill 2: Higan: Bonechill.

104902.desc: A status gained if the Mod is hit by an Ice Mirror shard.

104903.desc: An additional attack triggered by normal attacks, skills, or Ultimate Skills.

105201.desc: Status points earned by spending Energy or the third strike of normal attacks.

105202.desc: A drone for the Storm Blitz normal attack.

105203.desc: A drone for Skill 2: Quick Response.

105204.desc: A drone for Skill 3: Surround & Eliminate.

105205.desc: A drone for Skill 2: Quick Response after activating Aether Code: Supreme God's Design - Weakened.

105206.desc: A drone for Skill 3: Surround & Eliminate after activating Aether Code: Supreme God's Design - Bitter Fight.

105207.desc: A drone for Ultimate Skill: War of the Gods: End.

105501.desc:
A status inflicted on enemies after a normal attack or when chaining So-ei Strike straight after Skill 3: Frostbreaker, Skill 1: Shadowswayer, or Skill 2: Moonshatter.
Increases Crit Rate for all teammates when using Ice attacks against enemies with this status.

105502.desc:
A buff obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Effect: Grants Super Armor to reduce DMG taken, increases Crit DMG, and inflicts Frost upon enemies hit.

105503.desc: A paper puppet generated by using Aether Code: Crystalized Raindrops - Crystal.

105801.desc: A status granted by using Skill 3: Ashen: Smelt.

105802.desc: A mark gained by using Aether Code: Skyfire Descends - Fire Tornado.

105901.desc: A mark gained after landing a certain number of attacks on the enemy.

106001.desc: An area generated by using Skill 3: Spear Array.

106002.desc: A spear in Spearsky triggered by Skill 3: Spear Array.

106003.desc: A mark gained by retrieving a Spear.

106101.desc: Buff points gained by using normal attacks, Skill 1: Dwindling Water, Skill 2: North Star's Mandate, a Southwave attack triggered at full points, or a Dodge effect triggered by blocking.

106102.desc: Buff points gained by holding down Dodge or Block.

106103.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Dwindling Water.

106104.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 2: North Star's Mandate.

106601.desc:
A buff gained by using Skill 1: Divination, includes: 
<color=#ad25b5>The Death</color>: Increases ATK.
<color=#d7ac00>The Chariot</color>: Intermittently grants Rage.
<color=#5cb82b>The Lovers</color>: Intermittently restores HP.

106701.desc: A ghost summoned to the battlefield by using Skill 1: Rushing River or an Extremity Dodge.

106801.desc: A mark gained by using the final strike of a normal attack, Skill 1: Blast Squall, or Skill 2: Hurricane Spin.

107001.desc: A mark gained by using the final strike of a normal attack or Skill 2: Evil Crusher.

107002.desc:
A buff stack gained by using Skill 1: Demon Slayer.
Increases Skill DMG.

107003.desc:
A status gained by using Skill 3: Sun Chaser.
Grants Unyielding and reduces Dodge Energy costs when in midair.

107101.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches from Still Stance to Move Stance during Skill 3: Eternal Prosperity: Wind when Divine Grace is full, or from Move Stance to Still Stance when Divine Grace is depleted. Enters the battlefield in Still Stance.

107102.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches from Still Stance to Move Stance during Skill 3: Eternal Prosperity: Wind when Divine Grace is full, or from Move Stance to Still Stance when Divine Grace is depleted. Enters the battlefield in Still Stance.

107103.desc: A mark gained by using a normal attack when in Still Stance.

107104.desc: An attack triggered by Skill 1: Aero Dash, Skill 2: Stillness in Motion: Wind, normal attacks when Skill 2: Stillness in Motion: Wind is in cooldown, or a Dodge effect when in Still Stance.

107105.desc: An attack triggered by Skill 3: Eternal Prosperity: Thunder, or Aether Code: Lord of the East - Jadebolt.

107201.desc: Buff points gained by chaining Skill 3: Evil Expeller directly after a normal attack, Skill 1: Breezy Blessings, or Skill 2: Actus Abacus.

107202.desc: A Lucky Coin that follows your team, obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

107401.desc:
A status gained when Divine Grace is full.
While in effect, automatically depletes Divine Grace, shortens skill CD, and grants Unyielding. Increases ATK, reduces DMG taken and Divine Grace gain rate, and derivative skills no longer cost Divine Grace.

107501.desc:
The skill's first strike.
When the fourth or fifth strike of a normal attack hits, or when Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Start or Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite hits, Skill 1: Undying Flames and Skill 2: Rising Splendor will switch between their Start and Ignite forms.
Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Start will substitute for Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite upon hit, and Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite will substitute for Hexagram Auspicious: Start upon hit.

107502.desc:
The skill's second strike.
When the fourth or fifth strike of a normal attack hits, or when Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Start or Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite hits, Skill 1: Undying Flames and Skill 2: Rising Splendor will switch between their Start and Ignite forms.
Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Start will substitute for Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite upon hit, and Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite will substitute for Hexagram Auspicious: Start upon hit.

107503.desc:
The skill's third strike.
When in the Afire state, Traces may be spent to cast skills.

107504.desc: A team shield gained by using Skill 1: Undying Flames - Aflame.

107505.desc:
A team shield gained by using Skill 2: Rising Splendor - Aflame.
Effect: The lower the HP, the more DMG is dealt.

107506.desc:
A team shield gained by using Skill 3: Hexagram Auspicious - Aflame.
Effect: The higher the HP, the more DMG is dealt.

107507.desc:
A team shield gained by using any skill's Aflame form.
Effect: Attacks have a chance of dealing more Independent DMG.

107508.desc:
A team buff obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Effect: Increases Independent DMG.

107509.desc:
This state is entered after casting 4 skills within a set time limit.
Effect: All skills are replaced with their Aflame form. When the status wears off, all skills will return to their Start form.

107510.desc:
Gains this status by using Aether Code: Lady of the South - Reignition.
Effect: Increases Independent DMG.

107601.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Celestial Starfall - Yang, Skill 2: Cloud Meld - Yang, or triggering a Dodge effect.

107602.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Celestial Starfall - Yin, Skill 2: Cloud Meld - Yin, or triggering a Dodge effect.

107603.desc: A form entered by using Skill 3: Antarctic Echo - Yang.

107604.desc: A form entered by using Skill 3: Antarctic Echo - Yin.

107605.desc: A status inflicted on enemies by Aether Code: God of Wilderness - Deluge.

108101.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Cold Front or triggering a Dodge effect.

108102.desc:
A status gained by using Skill 3: Cruise Mode when Divine Grace is full.
Drives the Waverender faster and gains Super Armor while this status is in effect, but prevents the use of Ultimate Skill: Glacier Age.

108401.desc: A status inflicted on enemies by Skill 2: Swift Slash.

108901.desc: A mark obtained by expending Divine Grace. Mark type can be switched by using Skill 3: Free Alsaid or Ultimate Skill: Wheel of Cleansing.

108902.desc: A type of Aero Shot mark.

108903.desc: A type of Aero Shot mark.

108904.desc: A type of Aero Shot mark.

108905.desc:
Status granted by expending the Aero Shot - Azure mark with skills when HP is full.
DMG taken is reduced.

108906.desc:
Status granted by expending the Aero Shot - Amber mark with skills.
DMG is increased.

108907.desc:
Status granted by expending the Amber status and Aero Shot - Crimson mark with skills.
Wind DMG is increased.

108908.desc:
Status inflicted on enemies after hitting the same enemy six times with Petal Dance from Aether Code: Cyclic Peak - Immolation.
When Petal Dance hits a seventh time, this status will be cleared and bonus DMG dealt.

109301.desc: A combination of 2 types of Hold, "Heaven" and "Earth." Spend Mudra to cast the corresponding Ninjutsu skill.

109501.desc:
A status gained by holding down normal attack "Featherfall" when Energy is full.
Energy automatically depletes while the status is in effect.

109502.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Dance On Edge.

109503.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 2: Silverdrop.

109504.desc: A buff stack gained by using Invisible String in Aether Code: Words and Verses - Cipher, and a buff stack gained by using Aether Code: Words and Verses - Recitation to enter Weaver status.

109601.desc: A status gained by moving or spending enough Rage within a certain time then holding down Skill 2: Ride with the Wind.

109602.desc:
A status inflicted on enemies by using Skill 1: Falling Star, an Ultimate Skill, or an Ultimate Skillchain.
Downwind attacks deal more DMG against enemies with this status.

109701.desc: An area generated by using Skill 2: Fairytale Illustrated.

109702.desc: An area generated by using Skill 2: Garden of Dreams.

109703.desc: A status that deals continuous DMG to the enemy when attacked in the Garden of Dreams state.

109901.desc: A skill replaces another when Divine Grace is full.

111101.desc:
A status gained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Grants Super Armor and HP Removal while in effect.

111901.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches between Attack Stance and Defensive Stance when Skill 1: Shifting Winds is used. Enters the battlefield in Attack Stance.

111902.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches between Attack Stance and Defensive Stance when Skill 1: Shifting Winds is used. Enters the battlefield in Attack Stance.

111903.desc: A mark gained by launching a follow-up attack.

111904.desc: A mark gained by launching a counterattack.

112701.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Leapin' Krakens, or triggering Aether Code: Twisted Vortex - Whirling Eddy.

112702.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 2: Tide Summon, or triggering Aether Code: Twisted Vortex - Whirling Eddy.

112703.desc:
A status gained by using Aether Code: Steadfast Sea - Waves Afar.
Temporarily grants Invincibility when attacked.

113201.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches between and Burning Sword Stance and Blazing Armor Stance when Skill 3: Trial of Heat is used. Enters the battlefield in Burning Sword Stance.

113202.desc: A Modifier combat stance that switches between and Burning Sword Stance and Blazing Armor Stance when Skill 3: Trial of Heat is used. Enters the battlefield in Burning Sword Stance.

113203.desc: A status inflicted on enemies by Aether Code: Infernal Vengeance - Sinner.

113204.desc: Status points gained by using a normal attack or specific skill when in a certain stance.

113901.desc: A mark gained when landing a hit with the Additional Chant strike in Skill 1: Zero Mansard, or during Snow Echo.

113902.desc: A mark gained when landing a hit with the Additional Chant strike in Skill 2: Matter Frozen, or during Snow Echo.

113903.desc:
A status gained by spending 2 marks in Skill 3: Silver Frost.
Prevents the use of Skill 3 and gaining marks while the status is in effect. Skill 1: Zero Mansard and Skill 2: Matter Frozen will trigger the corresponding Additional Chant.

115001.desc:
A status gained by using Skill 3: Kata 9: Somezakura when Divine Grace is full.
Automatically depletes Divine Grace, reduces Divine Grace gain rate, and grants Ominous Blossom points when attacks hit while this status is in effect.

115002.desc: Buff points gained when attacks hit in the Sakuya state.

115003.desc: A mark gained when the Mod has Divine Grace in the Sakuya state and uses Skill 1: Kata 1: Halt or Skill 2: Kata 3: Dance.

115601.desc: A decision that presents itself when using some normal attacks and skills. Tap the corresponding normal attack or skill at the right moment to trigger different enhancement effects.

115602.desc: Mark obtained from Extremity Dodge, Aether Code: God of Wrath - Dark Lord, or Aether Code: God of Wrath - Resentment.

115603.desc: Status points gained by using a normal attack or skill.

115801.desc:
A status entered by dodging during Skill 2: Smoldering Heart, normal attacks, or Skill 1: Madoibi Flicker.
Continuously deals DMG, accumulates Madoibi, and increases the level of Heartsear while this status is in effect.

115802.desc: Buff stacks gained when in the Smelt state.

115803.desc:
A status gained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Automatically accumulates Madoibi while this status is in effect.

115804.desc:
A status inflicted on the Mod and enemies when performing an Extremity Dodge.
Blocks all attacks from enemies with this status.

115805.desc:
A status inflicted on the Mod and enemies by Aether Code: Spark of Calamity - Flaring Blaze.
Blocks all attacks from enemies with this status.

119701.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 1: Eternal Slumber or Skill 3: Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn.

119702.desc: A mark gained by using Skill 2: Distant Day Dream.

119703.desc: A status obtained by using an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

119704.desc:
A status gained by expending Energy while in Ethereal Dream.
While the status is in effect, all teammates deal extra damage when Shadow attacks hit and inflict reduced Shadow RES.

119705.desc: Extra damage triggered by the Moment of Waking skill and the Aether Code: Infinite Illusion - Eternal Sleep.

119901.desc: A status inflicted on enemies by Skill 1: Thunder: Ardent Light, Skill 2: Thunder: Dual Flow, or a normal attack after triggering a Dodge effect.

128401.desc: Buff points gained from normal attacks or skills when not in the Decision state.

128402.desc: A status gained by using Skill 3: Slash of Conviction when Daybreak is full.

1000001.desc:
When enemies are in this state, Overload will be triggered after a short time.
When enemies that are in this state are locked on again, the trigger time will be reduced.

1000002.desc: Summons lightning to strike the enemy, dealing Tactical DMG.

1000003.desc: A fixed amount of DMG resulting from various tactical effects.

1000011.desc: Can be fused to create an even bigger hurricane.

1000021.desc: Energy Charge has a max capacity of 1,000. When it is charged up to full, Electrical Arc will be triggered one time.

1000022.desc: Radiates electrical currents outward, dealing Tactical DMG to enemies that are hit.

1000023.desc:
A shield granted through Energy Charge. Can stack, and each stack duration is calculated individually.
When a shield is granted, grants Energy Charge equal to the base shield amount.

1000031.desc: Shoots 1 Sharp Blade in a straight line, dealing a small amount of Tactical DMG to the first enemy it hits. When Sharp Blade hits, there is a chance of dealing a large amount of extra Tactical DMG and generating 1 Chain Blade, which lasts for a period of time. The longer this effect doesn't trigger, the higher the chance it will trigger becomes. When it does trigger, the chance resets.

1000032.desc: A Chain Blade that spins around the Mod and stacks up to 4 times. Chain Blades deal Tactical DMG to enemies upon hit.

1000041.desc:
A stackable continuous damage effect. Enemies inflicted with Corrosion will take damage at regular intervals.
The amount of DMG at each interval will be based on the current number of Corrosion stacks on the enemy, while future Corrosion stacks are halved.

1000042.desc:
Enemies that remain in the Energy Field will be inflicted with the Corrosion state at regular intervals. Inflicts a progressively larger number of stacks each time, up to a maximum of 70 stacks at once.
Once an enemy leaves the Energy Field, stacks will restart from 1.

1000051.desc: Tracks the enemy and deals Tactical DMG upon hit, as well as inflicts 1 stack of Chill.

1000052.desc: Enemies that are in this state will have their movement speed reduced by 1% for every stack. At 30 stacks, the Chill state will be cleared and replaced with Freeze, triggering Blizzard.

1000053.desc: Deals a large amount of Tactical DMG over an area.

1000054.desc: Deals continuous Tactical DMG to enemies in range of Frosty Terrain and inflicts Chill.
